ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Another Question....
ygData.msgSnippet: I played EQ for 3 years and never heard that one. Maybe it s something that is said mostly on your server? The lingo can vary slightly from server to server.
ygData.messageBody:
I played EQ for 3 years and never heard that one.
Maybe it's something that is said mostly on your
server? The "lingo" can vary slightly from server to
server.

My guess though is it's a way to see just who all in
the zone is LFG, since a lot of people don't use the
/lfg tool.


--- bubi_g_67 <bubi_g_67@...> wrote:
> This might be a silly question for those of you who
> are experts at
> playing Everquest, but, I still have to ask it.
> What does it mean
> when a person shouts "looking for group check"?
> I've been playing
> for just over a year and have never quite figured
> out if this means
> that the person is looking for new group members or
> if they are
> acoounting for the members that are already in the
> group. Just a
> question from someone who simply does not know.
>
> Thanks
>
>
